Link Base.description: Link base directory [note that changing this will require updating the static html pages too], e.g. /.

web doc root location.description: Absolute path to the directory used for the web document root, e.g. /media/hdd/wxcapture/.

webpage keywords.description: A list of the keywords to be included in the header part of each dynamically created webpage, e.g. wxcapture, weather, satellite

drive space location.description: Drive location to monitor for space used, e.g. /dev/root.

drive space error.description: Monitored drive space location percent remaining error threshold, e.g. 90.

drive space warning.description: Monitored drive space location percent remaining warning threshold, e.g. 70.

skip header and footer.description: Skip headers and footers from generated pages, e.g. no.

Start Month.description: Start month number for the captures page links, e.g. 05.

Start Year.description: Start year for the captures page links, e.g. 2019.
